text: cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa brrda phu di rab khamphir thanghlay cng xya ptibati hı kein khxbkhet nı sasna khxng phwk than doy prascak khwam pen cring læa cng xya ptibati tam khwam khır fıta khxng phwk hnung phwk dı thi phwk khea di hlng phid ma kxn læw læa di thahı phukhn makmay hlng phid dwy læa phwk khea kdi hlng phid pi cak thang xan theiyngtrng
